about_the_game:
Indulge in Your Darkest Fantasies!



In Ancient Rome, demons rule and mortals are slaves. Follow the ambitious comfort slave Silvan as he schemes his way into the emperor's court to accomplish his mission of becoming a demon. He'll do whatever it takes to reach his goal--no matter the cost.

Both handsome and cunning, Silvan believes he can charm anyone, but the royal demons are not the same as his country masters. He commits an offense from the beginning that almost costs his life. The only way he'll be spared is to accept the role of comfort slave. Silvan has no choice.

  • A Manga/Visual Novel Hybrid!
  • Featuring 20 Full Color CGs and over 100 Black and White Manga Panels
  • A Darker, Kinkier, and More Extreme Y Press Offering
  • Three Love Interests and Four Possible Routes
  • Includes a Polyamorous Route
  • A Haunting Original Soundtrack of 12 Songs
  • Over 150,000 Words of Story
  • 14 Possible Game Endings
  • Press 'v' to Have Dialogue Read Out Loud



Silvan

​He's been a slave to ugly and ignorant rural demons all his life. He knows he's handsome and thinks he deserves better. Not knowing his place in the demonic empire is a sin that will haunt him.

Emperor Titan

The god Pluto made Titan the emperor of Rome due to his wisdom and strength, and he's sat upon his throne for hundreds of years. His tacit gaze sees through any scheme Silvan might try with him.

Minister of War Marius

Marius' dark and violent side is easily unleashed upon slaves who don't know their place--or those foolish enough to try to manipulate him. He specializes in something called the 'Ecstasy of Agony.'

Counselor Claudius

The once mortal counselor helps to balance out Marius' cruelty with mercy in the royal court. He's earned his place at the emperor's side with his intelligence and reason. Though fearsome in looks, he seems compassionate.

Titan and Marius Both

There is more than a working relationship between the emperor and his minister of war. Could an adept slave manage to lower the boundaries between them, while winning both their hearts at the same time? Throuples are not unheard of in the empire.

Julian

Julian has been a comfort slave for the royal court for several years. He has the same ambition as Silvan: to gain his freedom by turning into a demon. He doesn't appreciate that he now has a rival.

Aquila

Though not a comfort slave, Aquila is afforded special privileges since she sometimes finds herself in a demon's bed. She has no ambitions, and may warm up to Silvan in time.

ManServant is a visual novel and manga-style comic book hybrid. There are both CGs (full color images) and manga panels to illustrate the story.

Players can pursue Titan, Marius, Claudius, or both Titan and Marius--four full romantic routes! Over 100,000 words and loaded with multi-panel manga pages as well as full-color images.

highlighted.name: Poly Ending: Ask the Right Question
Poly Ending: He’s not Known for His Mercy
Claudius Ending: A Gift for Karn
Claudius Ending: Bad Masters Stick Together
Claudius Ending: Say no to Crack
Titan Ending: A Sacrifice Well Made

content_descriptors.notes: Contains explicit sexual content between humans and demons. Includes themes of slavery, abuse, rape, demon possession, human exploitation, bondage, and dominance.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9, OpenGL 2, OpenGL ES 2, WebGL, or Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 or Higher
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9, OpenGL 2, OpenGL ES 2, WebGL, or Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“* * * * * Perfectly kinky without any uncomfortable moments. The manga pages add so much more luscious content, and the stories manage to be touching, romantic, and mind-blowingly sexy. My favorite is the Poly route, hands down, but all four paths were unique and satisfying.”
5/5 – JHass Himbo

“Watching the different character transformations that happen from the moment you meet them to where they wind up at the end of his route was fantastic because there was arrogance turned thoughtful, desperation turned appreciative, strong turned vulnerable, vicious turned loving, and so many other different developments too. Even among the darker tones of the story and themes, each character developed in a believable way that allowed the story to progress satisfactorily. There were also different happenings in the story that kept me guessing as to what might happen next and/or at the edge of my seat. The adult scenes include quite the tasteful acts and various kinks, allowing the allure to those who can appreciate them along with Silvan and the other characters. Each of the manga panels and CGs are praiseworthy in their artistic execution, and moving through them while reading almost makes it feel animated at times. This is definitely worth investing in to see how the story unfolds and getting to know the characters.”
Vex Vexian
short_description: In Ancient Rome, demons rule and mortals are slaves. Follow the ambitious slave Silvan as he schemes his way into the emperor's court to accomplish his mission of becoming a demon.
